page.title: 12LANDSCAPE
page.content: We discovered some beautiful buildings in the area. They had been country homes of wealthy families 100 years ago. Peole no longer can afford to live in such vast houses. Heating them would be very expensive. One of the houses at{Fulmer}has been converted into luxury flats. The others have been beautifully restored by companies searching for{Group Head Quarters}away from London. With the large finance available the houses reflect their formal glory.{Stoke Court}was a virtual ruin until Miles bought it. They restored it then it was destroyed by fire. The original facade and internal rooms have been reproduced. {Sefton Park},in parts Elizabethan,has the most impressive entrance. Strange homes for industry connected with High-Tec.
